attributes.action: Force the Olympic Committee to change this dreadful logo.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The people of this great country should have the right to choose a logo for the games. Therefore a vote should be taken by us, not by people who waste £400,000.00 on something that is meaningless. Scrap the current one.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/2012-Emblem/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
